docs.summary:
Commit latest changes to the baseline order and control what side-effects will be applied.
Commit cannot be undone or reverted.
Order-edit become closed for editing, however it's kept for reference and can be retrieved.

examples.title: commitDraftOrder example for dashboard page code
commitDraftOrder example for exporting from backend code

docs.summary:
Create custom additional fees to the order.
added additional fees are by default opted-out.
To opt-in them, please call SetAdditionalFees with the added additional fee ids.

createCustomAdditionalFees example for exporting from backend code

params.name: orderId
params.doc: To create a draft from existing order, provide its id. Otherwise, an empty draft will be created.

docs.summary: Creates or gets a draft order.
description:
When passing the ID of an order that is already in draft, the existing draft order will be returned.
To complete a draft and update the order, call [Commit Draft Order](https://dev.wix.com/docs/rest/api-reference/wix-e-commerce/draft-orders/commit-draft-order).

examples.title: createDraftOrder example for dashboard page code
createDraftOrder example for exporting from backend code

docs.summary: Remove custom additional fees from the order.

examples.title: deleteCustomAdditionalFees example for dashboard page code
deleteCustomAdditionalFees example for exporting from backend code

docs.summary: Remove custom discounts from the order.

examples.title: deleteCustomDiscounts example for dashboard page code
deleteCustomDiscounts example for exporting from backend code

docs.summary:
Delete order-edit entity with all pending changes.
Order-edit in status 'COMMITTED' cannot be deleted.

examples.title: deleteDraftOrder example for dashboard page code
deleteDraftOrder example for exporting from backend code

docs.summary:
Get an order.
When order is in draft status, it's re-estimated and return with latest tax and totals
Automatic discounts and automatic additional fees will reflect the latest prices and eligibility.
Calculation will be based on current draft order content - items, shipping info and eligible discounts and additional fees.
When order is in committed status, it's returned with it's calculation at the moment it was committed.

examples.title: getDraftOrder example for dashboard page code
getDraftOrder example for exporting from backend code

docs.summary: Checks whether a draft can be created for thos order

examples.title: getOrderDraftabilityStatus example for dashboard page code
getOrderDraftabilityStatus example for exporting from backend code

|`orderId`|[`eq()`](wix-ecom-backend.DraftOrders.DraftOrdersQueryBuilder#eq),[`ne()`](wix-ecom-backend.DraftOrders.DraftOrdersQueryBuilder#ne),[`exists()`](wix-ecom-backend.DraftOrders.DraftOrdersQueryBuilder#exists),[`in()`](wix-ecom-backend.DraftOrders.DraftOrdersQueryBuilder#in),[`hasSome()`](wix-ecom-backend.DraftOrders.DraftOrdersQueryBuilder#hasSome),[`startsWith()`](wix-ecom-backend.DraftOrders.DraftOrdersQueryBuilder#startsWith)|

|`_createdDate`|[`eq()`](wix-ecom-backend.DraftOrders.DraftOrdersQueryBuilder#eq),[`ne()`](wix-ecom-backend.DraftOrders.DraftOrdersQueryBuilder#ne),[`exists()`](wix-ecom-backend.DraftOrders.DraftOrdersQueryBuilder#exists),[`in()`](wix-ecom-backend.DraftOrders.DraftOrdersQueryBuilder#in),[`hasSome()`](wix-ecom-backend.DraftOrders.DraftOrdersQueryBuilder#hasSome),[`lt()`](wix-ecom-backend.DraftOrders.DraftOrdersQueryBuilder#lt),[`le()`](wix-ecom-backend.DraftOrders.DraftOrdersQueryBuilder#le),[`gt()`](wix-ecom-backend.DraftOrders.DraftOrdersQueryBuilder#gt),[`ge()`](wix-ecom-backend.DraftOrders.DraftOrdersQueryBuilder#ge),[`ascending()`](wix-ecom-backend.DraftOrders.DraftOrdersQueryBuilder#ascending),[`descending()`](wix-ecom-backend.DraftOrders.DraftOrdersQueryBuilder#descending)|

|`_updatedDate`|[`eq()`](wix-ecom-backend.DraftOrders.DraftOrdersQueryBuilder#eq),[`ne()`](wix-ecom-backend.DraftOrders.DraftOrdersQueryBuilder#ne),[`exists()`](wix-ecom-backend.DraftOrders.DraftOrdersQueryBuilder#exists),[`in()`](wix-ecom-backend.DraftOrders.DraftOrdersQueryBuilder#in),[`hasSome()`](wix-ecom-backend.DraftOrders.DraftOrdersQueryBuilder#hasSome),[`lt()`](wix-ecom-backend.DraftOrders.DraftOrdersQueryBuilder#lt),[`le()`](wix-ecom-backend.DraftOrders.DraftOrdersQueryBuilder#le),[`gt()`](wix-ecom-backend.DraftOrders.DraftOrdersQueryBuilder#gt),[`ge()`](wix-ecom-backend.DraftOrders.DraftOrdersQueryBuilder#ge),[`ascending()`](wix-ecom-backend.DraftOrders.DraftOrdersQueryBuilder#ascending),[`descending()`](wix-ecom-backend.DraftOrders.DraftOrdersQueryBuilder#descending)|

params.doc: ID of the entity to update.

params.name: namespace
params.doc: Identifier for the app whose extended fields are being updated.

docs.summary: Updates extended fields of a DraftOrder

examples.title: updateExtendedFields example for dashboard page code
body: const result = await draftOrders.updateExtendedFields(id, namespace, options);

examples.title: updateExtendedFields example for exporting from backend code
body: const result = await elevatedUpdateExtendedFields(id, namespace, options);

docs.summary: Updates a draft order's line items.
description:
Using this API, you can update a line item's quantity, price, and description.
> **Notes:**
> + Passing a quantity of `0` will remove the line item.
> + Price cannot be updated for line items with `paymentOption: MEMBERSHIP`.
> + Quantity cannot be decreased fulfilled line items. To get fulfillment information, pass the order ID to [List Fulfillments For Single Order](https://dev.wix.com/docs/rest/api-reference/wix-e-commerce/order-fulfillments/list-fulfillments-for-single-order).

examples.title: updateLineItems example for dashboard page code
updateLineItems example for exporting from backend code

Allows also to remove the order shipping info.

updateShippingInfo example for exporting from backend code

Source of the additional fee.

+ `CUSTOM`: This additional fee was created by the [Create Custom Additional Fees](https://dev.wix.com/docs/rest/api-reference/wix-e-commerce/draft-orders/create-custom-additional-fees) API.

members.doc: Payment ID of payment associated with this activity

members.name: amount
members.doc:
Balance amount.

A negative `amount` represents the amount to be refunded. This can happen due to overcharging or the order being modified after a payment has been made.

members.name: formattedAmount
members.doc: Amount formatted with currency symbol.

description:
Order balance. Reflects amount left to be paid on order and is calculated dynamically. Can be negative per balance definition.
`amount` field depends on order payment status:
+ UNSPECIFIED, NOT_PAID: price_summary.total_price
+ PARTIALLY_PAID : price_summary.total_price - pay_now.total_price
+ PENDING, REFUNDED, PARTIALLY_REFUNDED, PAID : 0

members.name: balance
members.doc: Amount left to pay for order to be considered paid.

members.name: contactId
members.doc: Contact ID. Auto-created if one does not yet exist. For more information, see [Contacts API](https://dev.wix.com/api/rest/contacts/contacts/introduction).

members.name: email
members.doc: Buyer email address.

members.name: memberId
members.doc: Member ID (if site visitor is a site member).

members.name: visitorId
members.doc: Visitor ID (if site visitor is not a member).

description: Buyer Info

members.name: appId
members.doc:
ID of the app providing the catalog.

You can get your app's ID from its page in the [Wix Dev Center](https://dev.wix.com/apps).

For items from Wix catalogs, the following values always apply:
+ Wix Stores: `"215238eb-22a5-4c36-9e7b-e7c08025e04e"`
+ Wix Bookings: `"13d21c63-b5ec-5912-8397-c3a5ddb27a97"`
+ Wix Restaurants: `"9a5d83fd-8570-482e-81ab-cfa88942ee60"`

members.name: catalogItemId
members.doc: ID of the item within the catalog it belongs to.

members.name: options
members.doc:
Additional item details in key:value pairs. Use this optional field to provide more specificity with item selection. The `options` field values differ depending on which catalog is providing the items.

For products and variants from a Wix Stores catalog, learn more about [eCommerce integration](https://dev.wix.com/docs/rest/business-solutions/stores/catalog/e-commerce-integration).

description: Used for grouping line items. Sent when an item is added to a cart, checkout, or order.

members.name: cursor
members.doc:
Pointer to the next or previous page in the list of results.

Pass the relevant cursor token from the `pagingMetadata` object in the previous call's response.
Not relevant for the first request.

members.name: limit
members.doc: Maximum number of items to return in the results.

members.name: count
members.doc: Number of items returned in the response.

members.name: cursors
members.doc: Cursor strings that point to the next page, previous page, or both.

members.name: hasNext
members.doc:
Whether there are more pages to retrieve following the current page.

+ `true`: Another page of results can be retrieved.
+ `false`: This is the last page.

members.name: cursorPaging
members.doc: Cursor token pointing to a page of results. Not used in the first request. Following requests use the cursor token and not `filter` or `sort`.

members.name: filter
sort
members.doc:
Sort object in the following format:
`[{"fieldName":"sortField1","order":"ASC"},{"fieldName":"sortField2","order":"DESC"}]`

members.name: cursorPaging
members.doc: Cursor token pointing to a page of results. Not used in the first request. Following requests use the cursor token and not `filter` or `sort`.

members.name: next
members.doc: Cursor string pointing to the next page in the list of results.

members.name: prev
members.doc: Cursor pointing to the previous page in the list of results.

members.name: additionalData
members.doc: Additional data in key-value form. For example, `{ "Ticket number": "123456" }`.

members.name: appId
members.doc: ID of the app that created the custom activity.

members.name: type
members.doc: Custom activity type. For example, `"Ticket number set"`.

members.name: title
members.doc: Custom field title.

members.name: translatedTitle
members.doc: Translated custom field title.

members.name: value
members.doc: Custom field value.

members.doc: Catalog and item reference. Includes IDs for the item and the catalog it came from, as well as further optional info.

members.name: deliveryProfileId
members.doc: Delivery Profile Id for the product

members.name: descriptionLines
members.doc: Line item description lines. Used for display purposes for order.

members.name: fullPrice
members.doc: Item price **before** catalog-defined discount. Defaults to `price` when not provided.

members.name: itemType
members.doc: Item type. Either a preset type or custom.

members.name: lineItemPrice
members.doc: Total line item price **after** catalog-defined discount and line item discounts.

members.name: media
members.doc: Line item image details.

members.name: physicalProperties
members.doc: Physical properties of the item. When relevant, contains information such as SKU, item weight, and shippability.

members.name: price
members.doc: Item price **after** catalog-defined discount and line item discounts.

members.name: priceBeforeDiscounts
members.doc: Item price **before** line item discounts and **after** catalog-defined discount. Defaults to `price` when not provided.

members.name: priceDescription
members.doc: Additional description for the price. For example, when price is 0 but additional details about the actual price are needed - "Starts at $67".

members.name: productName
members.doc:
Item name.
+ Stores - `product.name`
+ Bookings - `service.info.name`
+ Events - `ticket.name`

members.name: quantity
members.doc:
Item quantity.

Min: `"1"`
Max: `"100000"`

members.name: url
members.doc: URL to the item's page on the site.

members.doc: The draft order details calculated with latest content

members.name: instructions

members.doc: deprecated in API's - to enable migration from rendering arbitrary tracing to rest response

members.name: expirationDate
members.doc: Link expiration time and date.

members.name: fileId
members.doc: ID of the secure file in media.

members.name: link
members.doc: Link will exist after the digital links have been generated on the order.

members.name: applied
members.doc: Whether this discount is applied to the order.

members.name: discount
members.doc: Discount details.

members.name: source
members.doc:
Source of the discount.

Supported values:
+ `ORIGINAL_ORDER`: This discount is part of the original order.
+ `CUSTOM`: This discount was created by the [Create Custom Discounts](https://dev.wix.com/docs/rest/api-reference/wix-e-commerce/draft-orders/create-custom-discounts) API.

members.name: amount
members.doc: Discount amount.

members.name: applyToDraftOrder
members.doc:
Should opt-in the added discount. default = false.
if not set or false, then to opt-in them, please call SetDiscounts with the added discounts ids

members.name: description
members.doc: Discount description as free text (optional).

members.name: discountType
members.doc:
Discount type.
* `"GLOBAL"` - discount applies to entire order.
* `"SPECIFIC-ITEMS"` - discount applies to a specific item.
* `"SHIPPING"` - discount applies to shipping. For example, free shipping.

members.name: lineItemId
members.doc: ID of line item discount applies to.

members.name: _id
members.doc: Discount rule ID

members.name: amount
members.doc: Discount value.

members.name: name
members.doc: Discount rule name

members.name: original
members.doc: Original discount rule name (in site's default language).

members.name: translated
members.doc: Translated discount rule name according to buyer language. Defaults to `original` when not provided.

members.name: _id
members.doc:
Unique event ID.
Allows clients to ignore duplicate webhooks.

members.name: entityEventSequence
members.doc:
A sequence number defining the order of updates to the underlying entity.
For example, given that some entity was updated at 16:00 and than again at 16:01,
it is guaranteed that the sequence number of the second update is strictly higher than the first.
As the consumer, you can use this value to ensure that you handle messages in the correct order.
To do so, you will need to persist this number on your end, and compare the sequence number from the
message against the one you have stored. Given that the stored number is higher, you should ignore the message.

members.name: entityFqdn
members.doc:
Assumes actions are also always typed to an entity_type
Example: wix.stores.catalog.product, wix.bookings.session, wix.payments.transaction

members.name: entityId
members.doc: ID of the entity associated with the event.

members.name: eventTime
members.doc: Event timestamp.

members.name: originatedFrom
members.doc: If present, indicates the action that triggered the event.

members.name: slug
members.doc:
This is top level to ease client code dispatching of messages (switch on entity_fqdn+slug)
This is although the created/updated/deleted notion is duplication of the oneof types
Example: created/updated/deleted/started/completed/email_opened

members.name: triggeredByAnonymizeRequest
members.doc:
Whether the event was triggered as a result of a privacy regulation application
(for example, GDPR).

Additional fees.
Includes details about the source, and whether the additional fee is applied to the order.

Deprecated. Use `taxInfo` instead.
This field will be removed on September 30, 2024.
Tax summary.

description: DraftOrder is the main entity of DraftOrders service. It represents a single edit order.

members.name: changes
members.doc: Changes applied to order.

Whether to add activities to the order.

Default: `true`

members.doc:
Whether to send notifications to the business.

Default: `true`

members.name: sendNotificationsToBuyer
members.doc:
Whether to send notifications to the buyer.

Default: `true`

members.name: sendNotificationsToCustomFulfillers
members.doc:
Whether to send email notifications to custom fulfillers when there is a change in the shippable items they fulfill.

Default: `true`

Line item IDs for which to perform an inventory change.
When not provided, inventory will not change.

description: Side-effects upon committing a draft order.

members.name: deletedEntityAsJson
members.doc: Entity that was deleted

members.name: currentEntityAsJson
members.doc:
Since platformized APIs only expose PATCH and not PUT we can't assume that the fields sent from the client are the actual diff.
This means that to generate a list of changed fields (as opposed to sent fields) one needs to traverse both objects.
We don't want to impose this on all developers and so we leave this traversal to the notification recipients which need it.

members.name: namespaces
members.doc:
Extended field data. Each key corresponds to the namespace of the app that created the extended fields.
The value of each key is structured according to the schema defined when the extended fields were configured.

You can only access fields for which you have the appropriate permissions.

Learn more about [extended fields](https://dev.wix.com/docs/rest/articles/getting-started/extended-fields).

members.doc:

- `'DECIMAL_LT'`
- `'DECIMAL_LTE'`
- `'DECIMAL_MAX_SCALE'`

- `'FORMAT'`

- `'MAX_SIZE'`
- `'MIN'`
- `'MIN_LENGTH'`
- `'MIN_SIZE'`
- `'ONE_OF_ALIGNMENT'`
- `'OTHER'`
- `'REQUIRED_FIELD'`
- `'VALIDATION'`

Language for communication with the buyer. Defaults to the site language.
For a site that supports multiple languages, this is the language the buyer selected.

members.doc: Information about the sales channel that submitted this order.

members.name: customFields

members.name: extendedFields
members.doc:
Custom field data for the order object.

[Extended fields](https://dev.wix.com/docs/rest/articles/getting-started/extended-fields) must be configured in the Wix Dev Center before they can be accessed with API calls.

members.name: fulfillmentStatus
members.doc: Order fulfillment status.

members.name: lineItems
members.doc: Order line items.

members.name: number
members.doc: Order number displayed in the site owner's dashboard (auto-generated).

members.name: paymentStatus
members.doc:
Order payment status.
+ `NOT_PAID` - This can be an order made online, but not yet paid. In such cases `order.status` will be `INITIALIZED`.
+ This status also applies when an offline order needs to be manually marked as paid. In such cases `order.status` will be `APPROVED`.
+ `PAID` - All payments associated with this order are paid. For online payments: [`payment.regularPaymentDetails.status: APPROVED`](https://dev.wix.com/docs/rest/api-reference/wix-e-commerce/order-transactions/order-transactions-object). For gift cards: [`payment.giftCardPaymentDetails.voided: false`](https://dev.wix.com/docs/rest/api-reference/wix-e-commerce/order-transactions/order-transactions-object).
+ `PARTIALLY_REFUNDED` - Order was refunded, but refund amount is less than order total price.
+ `FULLY_REFUNDED` - Order fully refunded. Refund amount equals total price.
+ `PENDING` - Payments received but not yet confirmed by the payment provider.
+ `PARTIALLY_PAID` -  At least one payment was received and approved, covering less than total price amount.

members.name: priceSummary
members.doc: Order price summary.

members.name: purchaseFlowId
members.doc: Persistent ID that correlates between the various eCommerce elements: cart, checkout, and order.

members.name: recipientInfo
members.doc:
Order recipient address and contact details.

This field may differ from the address in `shippingInfo.logistics` when:
+ The chosen shipping option is pickup point or store pickup.
+ No shipping option is selected.

members.name: seenByAHuman
members.doc: Whether a human has seen the order. Set when an order is clicked on in the dashboard.

members.name: shippingInfo
members.doc: Shipping info and selected shipping option details.

members.name: siteLanguage
members.doc: Site language in which original values are shown.

members.name: status
members.doc:
Order status.
+ `INITIALIZED` - Order was created, but not yet approved or declined.
+ `APPROVED` - Order was approved. This happens when either the online payment succeeded or the order is an offline order. Once an order is approved, many side effects are triggered. For example, holding of stock in the inventory and sending of notification emails.
+ `CANCELED` - Order was canceled by the user.

members.name: taxIncludedInPrices
members.doc: Whether tax is included in line item prices.

members.name: taxInfo
members.doc: Tax information.

members.name: taxSummary
members.doc:
Tax summary.
Deprecated. Use `taxInfo` instead.
This field will be removed on September 30, 2024.

members.name: weightUnit
members.doc: Weight measurement unit - defaults to site's weight unit.

members.name: originalOrderId
members.doc: ID of the original order for which the exchange happened.

members.name: _id
members.doc: Line item ID.

members.name: catalogReference
members.doc:
References to the line item's origin catalog.
This field is empty in the case of a custom line item.

members.name: depositAmount
members.doc: Item's price amount to be charged during checkout. Relevant for items with a `paymentOption` value of `"DEPOSIT_ONLINE"`.

members.name: descriptionLines
members.doc: Line item description lines. Used for display purposes for the cart, checkout and order.

members.name: digitalFile
members.doc: Digital file identifier, relevant only for items with type DIGITAL.

members.name: fulfillerId
members.doc:
Fulfiller ID. Field is empty when the line item is self-fulfilled.
To get fulfillment information, pass the order ID to [List Fulfillments For Single Order](https://dev.wix.com/docs/rest/api-reference/wix-e-commerce/order-fulfillments/list-fulfillments-for-single-order).

members.name: image
members.doc: Line item image.

members.name: itemType
members.doc: Item type. Either a preset type or custom.

members.name: paymentOption
members.doc:
Type of selected payment option for current item. Defaults to `FULL_PAYMENT_ONLINE`.
+ `FULL_PAYMENT_ONLINE` - The entire payment for this item happens as part of the checkout.
+ `FULL_PAYMENT_OFFLINE` - The entire payment for this item happens after the checkout. For example, when using cash, check, or other offline payment methods.
+ `MEMBERSHIP` - Payment for this item is done by charging a membership. When this option is used, `lineItem.price.amount` is 0.
+ `DEPOSIT_ONLINE` - Partial payment for the given item to be paid upfront during the checkout. Eligible for catalog items with type `DEPOSIT_ONLINE` only.

members.name: physicalProperties
members.doc: Physical properties of the item. When relevant, contains information such as SKU and item weight.

members.name: price
members.doc: Line item price after line item discounts for display purposes.

members.name: priceBeforeDiscounts
members.doc: Line item price before line item discounts for display purposes. Defaults to `price` when not provided.

members.name: priceDescription
members.doc: Additional description for the price. For example, when price is 0 but additional details about the actual price are needed - "Starts at $67".

members.name: productName
members.doc:
Item name.
+ Stores - `product.name`
+ Bookings - `service.info.name`
+ Events - `ticket.name`

members.name: quantity
members.doc: Line item quantity.

members.name: refundQuantity
members.doc: Number of items that were refunded.

members.name: restockQuantity
members.doc: Number of items restocked.

members.name: subscriptionInfo
members.doc: Subscription info.

members.name: taxDetails
members.doc:
Deprecated. Use `taxInfo` instead.
This field will be removed on September 30, 2024.
Tax details for this line item.

members.name: taxInfo
members.doc: Represents all the relevant tax details for a specific line item.

members.name: totalDiscount
members.doc: Total discount for this line item's entire quantity.

members.name: totalPriceAfterTax
members.doc: Total price after all discounts and tax.

members.name: totalPriceBeforeTax
members.doc: Total price after discounts, and before tax.

members.name: amount
members.doc: Refund amount.

members.name: manual
members.doc: Whether order was refunded manually. For example, via payment provider or using cash.

members.name: reason
members.doc: Reason for refund.

members.name: aggregatedTaxAmount
members.doc: The sum of all the tax from line items that calculated by the tax identifiers.

members.name: jurisdiction
members.doc: The name of the jurisdiction in which this tax detail applies.

members.name: jurisdictionType
members.doc: The type of the jurisdiction in which this tax detail applies (e.g. Country,State,County,City,Special).

members.name: rate
members.doc: The rate at which this tax detail was calculated.

members.name: taxName
members.doc: The name of the tax against which this tax amount was calculated.

members.name: taxType
members.doc: The type of tax that was calculated. Depends on the company's nexus settings as well as the jurisdiction's tax laws.

description:
The summary of the tax breakdown for all the line items. It will hold for each tax name, the aggregated tax amount paid for it and the tax rate.
Tax breakdown is the tax amount split to the tax authorities that applied on the line item.

members.name: taxBreakdown
members.doc: The summary of the tax breakdown for all the line items. It will hold for each tax name, the aggregated tax amount paid for it and the tax rate.

members.name: totalTax
members.doc: Calculated tax, added from line items.

members.name: shippable
members.doc: Whether this line item is shippable.

members.name: sku
members.doc: Stock-keeping unit. Learn more about [SKUs](https://www.wix.com/encyclopedia/definition/stock-keeping-unit-sku).

members.name: weight
members.doc: Line item weight. Measurement unit matches the weight unit specified in `weightUnit` in the request.

members.name: addressLine1
members.doc: Main address line (usually street name and number).

members.name: addressLine2
members.doc: Free text providing more detailed address info. Usually contains apt, suite, floor.

members.name: city
members.doc: City name.

members.name: country
members.doc: Two-letter country code in [ISO-3166 alpha-2](https://www.iso.org/obp/ui/#search/code/) format.

members.name: postalCode
members.doc: Postal or zip code.

members.name: streetAddress
members.doc: Street address object, with number, name, and apartment number in separate fields.

members.name: subdivision
members.doc: Code for a subdivision (such as state, prefecture, or province) in [ISO 3166-2](https://www.iso.org/standard/72483.html) format.

description: Physical address

members.name: address
members.doc: Pickup address

members.name: pickupMethod
members.doc:
Pickup method.

Supported values:
+ `"STORE_PICKUP"`
+ `"PICKUP_POINT"`

members.name: original
members.doc: Description line plain text value in the site's default language as defined in the [request envelope](https://dev.wix.com/docs/build-apps/develop-your-app/frameworks/self-hosting/supported-extensions/backend-extensions/add-self-hosted-service-plugin-extensions#request-envelope).

members.name: translated

Description line plain text value translated into the buyer's language.

Default: Same as `original`.

members.name: amount
members.doc: Amount.

members.name: formattedAmount
members.doc: Amount formatted with currency symbol.

members.name: original

members.name: translated
members.doc:
Price description translated into the buyer's language.

Default: Same as `original`.

members.name: discount
members.doc: Total calculated discount value.

members.name: shipping
members.doc: Total shipping price, before discounts and before tax.

members.name: subtotal
members.doc: Subtotal of all the line items, before discounts and before tax.

members.name: tax
members.doc: Total tax on this order.

members.name: total
members.doc: Orders total price after discounts and tax.

members.name: totalAdditionalFees
members.doc: Total price of additional fees before tax.

members.name: original
members.doc:
__Required.__ Item name in the site's default language as defined in the [request envelope](https://dev.wix.com/docs/build-apps/develop-your-app/frameworks/self-hosting/supported-extensions/backend-extensions/add-self-hosted-service-plugin-extensions#request-envelope).

Min: 1 character.
Max: 200 characters.

members.name: translated
members.doc:
Item name translated into the buyer's language.

Min: 1 character.
Max: 400 characters.
Default: Same as `original`.

members.name: query
members.doc: WQL expression

members.name: draftOrders
members.doc: list of edits per order

members.name: pagingMetadata
members.doc: Paging metadata.

members.name: recipientInfoBeforeChange
members.doc: Order recipient address and contact details before draft.

members.name: added
members.doc: Indicates that recipient information was added during draft.

members.name: changedDetails
members.doc: Indicates that recipient information was changed. Contains recipient information before draft.

members.name: recipientInfo
members.doc: Order recipient address and contact details.

members.name: removed
members.doc: Indicates that recipient information was removed during draft.

members.name: added
members.doc: Indicates that recipient information was added during draft.

members.name: changedDetails
members.doc: Indicates that recipient information was changed. Contains recipient information before draft.

members.name: removed
members.doc: Indicates that recipient information was removed during draft.

members.name: description
members.doc: Payment method description

members.name: name
members.doc: Payment method name

description: Payment method is saved for order

members.name: _id
members.doc: Media ID in Wix Media Manager.

members.name: fileName
members.doc: Original filename.

members.name: fileType
members.doc: File type.

members.name: additionalFees
members.doc: The additional fees ids to opt-in. all existing additional fees not listed are to be opted-out

members.name: draftOrderId
members.doc: The draft order id

members.name: calculatedDraftOrder
members.doc: The draft order details calculated with modified additional fees

members.name: discounts
members.doc: The discount ids to opt-in. all existing discounts not listed are to be opted-out.

members.name: draftOrderId
members.doc: The draft order id

members.name: calculatedDraftOrder
members.doc: The draft order details calculated with latest content

members.name: shippingInfoBeforeChange
members.doc: Shipping info before the change.

members.name: added
members.doc: Whether shipping info was added as part of the draft.

members.name: changedDetails
members.doc: Shipping info before the change.

members.name: removed
members.doc: Whether shipping info was removed as part of the draft.

members.name: shippingInfo
members.doc: Selected Shipping details.

members.name: added
members.doc: Whether shipping info was added as part of the draft.

members.name: changedDetails
members.doc: Shipping info before the change.

members.name: removed
members.doc: Whether shipping info was removed as part of the draft.

members.name: carrierId
members.doc: App Def Id of external provider which was a source of shipping info

members.name: code
members.doc: Unique code (or ID) of selected shipping option. For example, `"usps_std_overnight"``.

members.name: cost
members.doc: Shipping costs.

members.name: logistics
members.doc: Shipping logistics.

members.name: region
members.doc: Shipping region.

members.name: title
members.doc:
Shipping option title.
For example, `"USPS Standard Overnight Delivery"`, `"Standard"` or `"First-Class Package International"`.

members.name: carrierId
members.doc: This carrier's unique ID

members.name: code
members.doc: Unique code that acts as an ID for a shipping rate. For example, `"usps_std_overnight"`.

members.name: cost
members.doc: Shipping cost.

members.name: logistics
members.doc: Shipping logistics.

members.name: title
members.doc: Shipping rate title. For example, `"USPS Standard Overnight Delivery"`, `"Standard"`, or `"First-Class Package International"`.

members.name: currency
members.doc: Currency of the shipping rate price as a 3-letter [ISO-4217 currency code](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_4217). Must align with the `currency` passed to the function.

members.name: price
members.doc: The shipping rate's price. Must align with the [currency's decimal separator](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_4217#Active_codes).

members.name: name
members.doc: Name of shipping region. For example, `"Metropolitan London"`, or `"Outer Melbourne suburbs"`.

members.name: fieldName
members.doc: Name of the field to sort by.

members.name: order
members.doc: Sort order.

members.name: name
members.doc: Street name.

members.name: number
members.doc: Street number.

members.name: _id
members.doc: Subscription ID.

members.name: cycleNumber
members.doc: Subscription cycle. For example, if this order is for the 3rd cycle of a subscription, value will be `3`.

members.name: subscriptionOptionDescription
members.doc: Subscription option description. For example, `"1kg of selected coffee, once a month"`.

members.name: subscriptionOptionTitle
members.doc: Subscription option title. For example, `"Monthly coffee Subscription"`.

members.name: subscriptionSettings
members.doc: Subscription detailed information.

members.name: autoRenewal
members.doc: Whether subscription is renewed automatically at the end of each period.

members.name: billingCycles
members.doc: Number of billing cycles before subscription ends. Ignored if `autoRenewal: true`.

members.name: frequency
members.doc: Frequency of recurring payment.

members.name: interval
members.doc: Interval of recurring payment.

members.name: errorCode
members.doc: Error code.

members.name: tagIds
members.doc: List of tag IDs

members.name: privateTags
members.doc: Tags that require an additional permission in order to access them, normally not given to site members or visitors.

members.name: tags
members.doc: Tags that are exposed to anyone who has access to the labeled entity itself, including site members and visitors.

members.name: taxGroupId
members.doc: Optional tax group ID to use when calculating tax for this additional fee

members.name: taxable
members.doc: Indication if additional fee is taxable or not

members.name: totalTax
members.doc: Total tax.

members.name: newTotal
members.doc: Orders total price after discounts and tax. After update

members.name: originalTotal
members.doc: Orders total price after discounts and tax. Before update

members.name: original
members.doc: Value in site default language.

members.name: translated
members.doc: Translated value.

members.name: namespaceData
members.doc: Data to update. Structured according to the [schema](https://dev.wix.com/docs/rest/articles/getting-started/extended-fields#json-schema-for-extended-fields) defined when the extended fields were configured.

members.name: _id
members.doc: ID of the entity to update.

members.name: namespace
members.doc: Identifier for the app whose extended fields are being updated.

members.name: namespaceData
members.doc: Data to update. Structured according to the [schema](https://dev.wix.com/docs/rest/articles/getting-started/extended-fields#json-schema-for-extended-fields) defined when the extended fields were configured.

members.name: draftOrder
members.doc: Updated DraftOrder

members.name: lineItemChanges
members.doc: Details of changes to apply per line item

members.name: draftOrderId
members.doc: The draft order id

members.name: lineItemChanges
members.doc: Details of changes to apply per line item

members.name: calculatedDraftOrder
members.doc: The draft order details calculated with latest content

members.name: shippingOption
members.doc: update the shipping option on the order. if not set then the selected shipping is removed

members.name: draftOrderId
members.doc: The draft order id

members.name: shippingOption
members.doc: update the shipping option on the order. if not set then the selected shipping is removed

members.name: calculatedDraftOrder
members.doc: The draft order details calculated with de/selected shipping info

members.name: balance
members.doc: Current amount left to pay.

members.name: paid
members.doc:
Sum of all approved and successful payments.

The value includes payments that have subsequently been fully or partially refunded.

members.name: refunded
members.doc: Sum of all successfully refunded payments.

members.name: appId
members.doc: App ID - when the order was created by an external application.

members.name: memberId
members.doc: Member ID - when the order was created by a **logged in** site visitor.

members.name: userId
members.doc:
User ID - when the order was created by a Wix user on behalf of a buyer.
For example, via POS (point of service).

members.name: visitorId
members.doc: Visitor ID - when the order was created by a site visitor that was **not** logged in.

members.name: appId
members.doc: App ID - when the order was created by an external application.

members.name: memberId
members.doc: Member ID - when the order was created by a **logged in** site visitor.

members.name: userId
members.doc:
User ID - when the order was created by a Wix user on behalf of a buyer.
For example, via POS (point of service).

members.name: visitorId
members.doc: Visitor ID - when the order was created by a site visitor that was **not** logged in.

members.name: deliverByDate
members.doc: Deprecated - Latest expected delivery date and time in [ISO-8601](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_8601#Combined_date_and_time_representations) format.

members.name: deliveryTime
members.doc: Expected delivery time in free text. For example, `"3-5 business days"`.

members.name: deliveryTimeSlot
members.doc: Expected delivery time.

members.name: instructions
members.doc: Instructions for carrier. For example, `"Please knock on the door. If unanswered, please call contact number. Thanks."`.

members.name: pickupDetails
members.doc: Pickup details.

members.name: shippingDestination
members.doc: Shipping address and contact details.

members.name: pickupDetails
members.doc: Pickup details.

members.name: shippingDestination
members.doc: Shipping address and contact details.

members.name: from
members.doc: Delivery slot starting time.

members.name: to
members.doc: Delivery slot ending time.

members.name: address
members.doc: Pickup address.

members.name: pickupMethod
members.doc: Pickup method

members.name: discount
members.doc: Shipping discount before tax.

members.name: price
members.doc: Shipping price for display purposes.

members.name: taxDetails
members.doc: Tax details.

members.name: totalPriceAfterTax
members.doc: Shipping price after all discounts (if any exist), and after tax.

members.name: totalPriceBeforeTax
members.doc: Total price of shipping after discounts (when relevant), and before tax.

members.name: _id
members.doc: Customer's tax ID.

members.name: type
members.doc:
Tax type.

Supported values:
+ `CPF`: for individual tax payers
+ `CNPJ`: for corporations
